p: Mortality for the group (1) in the ICU and hospital was 7.5 % and 10.3 % respectively an the group (2) was 10.6 % and 18.6 %. The expected mortality by SAPS3 to group (1) was 12.3 % ± 15.4 and (2) 13.4 % ± 15.2. The Z test was evaluated for two proportions and there was no difference in mortality in the ICU for both groups, there were differences for in-hospital mortality, was more significant for cancer patients.
